attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently we have two main tax brackets 22% and 40 %.
I propose that we should introduce more tax brackets. so that as your earnins increase you slowly move on to a higher tax bracket.

i.e.  

earn 5000    5%
     6000    6%
     7000    7%  ect
the exact figues would have to be worked out but this would allow lower earners to pay less tax and the gap between tax brackets would not have a massive effect on tax payers
